James Gardiner

Software Engineer

Do you need a motivated, experienced, professional and highly skilled developer for your next project?

Whether it's building RESTful APIs, creating cloud infrastructure, getting databases up and running or developing a great new web app, I can help make your project a success!

My skills are in backend development. I'm most at home diving into web frameworks like Django and Flask, and I know my way around PostgreSQL and MongoDB. On the front-end, I've created geospatial apps with libraries like Leaflet and OpenLayers.

Even though I code mainly in Python I'm not limited by languages: I have experience with C, Java, Javascript and SQL, and the same goes for frameworks: I pick the right tool for the job, and am happy to pick up new ones quickly.

Feel free to get in touch with me at james@jgardiner.co.uk
